post.title: sony 46" v4100 vs w3000 - which one is better?
post.content: i am looking for a 46" tv, and consider the sony new line 46v4100 or an old 46w3000. if their prices are the same, which one should i pick? 46v4100 looks better with new be2 engine. 46w3000 is 10-bit panel vs 46v4100 which is 8-bit panel
